items.sentence: Fuel-efficient vehicles can reduce pollution.
Tom promised to come, but he never showed up.
Tom put down his spoon and picked up his cup.
Tom put everything in the middle of the room.
It\'ll be hard to find a replacement for Tom.
I need to tell Tom about tomorrow\'s meeting.
Your explanation was very easy to understand.
Tom had no difficulty in solving the problem.
Tom knew he shouldn\'t tell Mary, but he did.
Don\'t you dare tell anyone else what I said.
Don\'t you ever wonder why no one trusts you?
Tom didn\'t even bother knocking on the door.
Tom didn\'t even bother to go to the meeting.
Tom turned the knob and pushed the door open.
Have you told Tom who your French teacher is?
Have your knees been giving you any problems?
I never knew swimming could be this much fun.
I only knew how to speak French at that time.
I wish I could buy you everything you needed.
Tom hardly ever buys things he doesn\'t need.
